description: Retrieves the current balances for an existing end-user.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

queryParameters.name: currency
queryParameters.description: Returns the balance for a specific currency.

description: Retrieves the aggregated current balance of a specified currency or cryptocurrency held by the company.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

pathParameters.name: currency
pathParameters.description: Specifies the symbol of the currency associated with the current operation. For example, "BTC" represents Bitcoin.

description: Retrieves the up-to-date balances for all end-users within a company.

queryParameters.name: page_number
queryParameters.description: Specifies the page number from which the request will start.

queryParameters.name: page_size
queryParameters.description: Specifies the number of items displayed per page in the paginated result.

queryParameters.name: limit
queryParameters.description: Specifies the credit limit for the end-user.

description: Retrieves the aggregated balances held by the broker.

summary: Broker - Get Balances by Liquidity Provider
description: Retrieves the balances held by the broker at a specific liquidity provider.

pathParameters.name: liquidity_user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the broker at liquidity provider.
